column3: anaa oguan a no ho wɔ dzɛm
column5: mmbɔ okum afɔr mma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn na ɔyɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn."

column3: wɔ wo nkuropon a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no biara mu
column4: ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa bi a ɔyɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyi do dɛ ɔto n'ahyɛmu
column10: anaa ɔsor dɔm no mu biara a mennhyɛɛ ho mbra no
column14: ɔno hwehwɛ mu yie na hwɛ
column16: na asɛm no wɔ mu ampa
column17: dɛ ɔayɛ dɛm ekyiwadze yi wɔ Israel a;"

column2: "ɔno fa ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa no a ɔayɛ dɛm adze bɔn yi fir edzi kɔ wo kuropon ho
column3: na wonsiw no abo ma onwu."
anaa adasefo baasa anomu do na wɔmfa nku nyia ɔsɛ owu no; mma wɔmmfa ɔdasefo kor anomu do nnku no."

column2: "Adasefo no nsa na ondzi kan wɔ no do nku no
column3: na n'ekyir no ɔman no nyinara hɔn nsa. Ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu."

column2: "Sɛ asɛm bi ho atsɛmbu yɛ dzen dodow ma wo
column3: wɔ ewudzi nye nsa a apa ntamu
column6: dɛ ɔyɛ akasakasa bi wɔ wo kuropon mu a
column8: na kɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi no;"

column3: nye nda no mu ɔtsɛmbufo a ɔwɔ do no nkyɛn na kebisa; na wɔnkyerɛ wo asɛm no n'atsɛmbu:"

column2: "na yɛ dɛ mbrɛ asɛm a wɔbɛkyerɛ wo wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE bɛsan mu eyi no tse no ara; na dwen do yɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo no nyinara:"

column3: na mbrɛ atsɛmbu a wɔbɛka akyerɛ wo no tse no ara
column4: na yɛ: mma nndan mmfi asɛm a wɔbɛkyerɛ wo no ho nnkɔ enyimfa anaa abankum."

column3: dɛ orinntsie ɔsɔfo a ogyina hɔ som wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim
column5: dɛm nyimpa no onwu: na yi mbusu no fi Israel."

column2: "Sɛ idu asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do
column7: dɛ amanaman a wotwa mo ho hyia nyinara no a;"

column2: "nyia EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi no no noara na fa no si wo do hen: wo nuanom mu bi na fa no si wo do hen: mma mmfa ɔnanaben bi a ɔnnyɛ wo nua nnsi wo do."
"Mma ɔhen no mma no mpɔnkɔ nndɔɔ so mma no
column3: nkyii so mma ɔmma ɔman no nnsan nnkɔ Egypt
column4: nnkɛpɛ no mpɔnkɔ dodow: mber dodowara a EWURADZE ase hom dɛ ɔdzekɔr yi mma hom nnsan mmfa ɔkwan no do bio no."

column2: "Nkyii so mma ɔmma ne yernom nndɔɔ so."

column3: sɛ ɔtse n'ahendzi ahengua do a
column4: onsusu mbra yi a ɔwɔ asɔfo Levifo no enyim no do nkyerɛw bi wɔ nwoma mu mma noho:"

column3: na ɔnkenkan mu no nkwa nda nyinara: na oeesua dɛ obosuro EWURADZE no Nyankopɔn
column4: na odzi mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara nye ahyɛdze yi do

column2: "na n'akoma aamma noho do annsen no nuanom
column3: na ɔaanndan emmfi mbrasɛm no ho ammfa enyimfa
column4: anaa abankum: ama ne nda aawar wɔ n'ahendzi mu
column5: ɔno nye ne mba wɔ Israel."
